resources.string: You finished your skip possibilities, so you have to answer to the question!! Good luck!! :)
WRONG DOUBLE ANSWER! \n you lost 2 points!!

RIGHT ANSWER! 
 You gained a new BADGE!
 You also gained 1 point!! 
 Do you feel brave??" 
 "Do you want to try a DOUBLE????"
RIGHT DOUBLE ANSWER! \n Your badge now is golden!!! \n and you gained 2 points!"

WELCOME TO THE NINTENDO QUIZ !! 

 You will face 10 questions, regarding some of the most famous games of Nintendo history. 
 for each correct answer, you will earn 1 point ..
 for each wrong answer, you lose 1 point ..
 if (you had to get to -1) ... {GAME OVER!}


you will have three chances to skip the questions, ended the three possibilities, you can only guess !!


for each correct answer, you will have the chance to go to DOUBLE! where there is a question on the same game .. but with an EXTREME difficulty.
 for each correct answer in doubling, you will earn 2 points, but watch out .. for every wrong answer in doubling .. you will lose 2 points! so be carefull.. only the brave will face the doubling!


the button on the top right, will show you at any time your score and how many chances to skip the answer you still have.. think carefully before you make your move!


have a great time and good luck!
Super Mario: \n Mario is the most famous videogames’ plumber. Which is the name of his partner, thousands adventures mate and inseparable brother of this tireless hero?
Donkey Kong: \n borned as first enemy of Super Mario, soon became one of mostly loved heroes of Nintendo’s family, embracing the goods’ side; which animal is Donkey Kong?

Mario Kart: \n in the famous videogame Mario Kart, the most loved Nintendo characters, challenge each other in engaging go-kart race, equipped with special weapons used to reach the first position.. How that weapons were assigned?
Suer Smash Bros Melee: \n in this fighting game, the most famous Nintendo characters faced each others on the ring in no holds barred matches! how do the characters went K.O.?
F-Zero: \n in this great space-run videogame, you could reach unbelievable speeds.. Although, there was a way to even accelerates.. How??
Metroid Prime: \n in this masterpiece, the intergalactic bounty hunter has to explore an insidious alien planet.. what’s the planet name?

Sarfox: \n in this revolutionary videogame (the first in videogame history that presents a three-dimensional graphic) there are epic space battle for Lyla system safety. Protagonist of this saga is a mercenary astronauts team.. what’s the name of their smart leader?

Megaman II: \n one of the game that build the Nintendo history, absorbing and revolutionary for many reasons. In this videogame (as for the whole saga) the protagonist is an android created by dr Light, that should face an evil scientist.. what’s the name of this evil scientist?

The Legend of Zelda: \n Ocarina of Time - simply epic, one of the best videogame of ever. Glorify the tales of one of the most famous videogame characters: Link. fundamental is the help of his majestic horse, entrusted him by the Lon Lon Ranch.. which is the name of this beautiful animal?

Chrono Trigger: \n rated by many as one of the best video games, this RPG, was for many aspects revolutionary.. one reason of all: it had several alternative endings .. the player could make a difference, not just to complete a story written for him by someone else .. just like in this famous game, now you are writing your story.. Reply to the last question and write your outcome! What is the chrono trigger, which gives its name to this game?

SPECIAL DOUBLE 1: \n in one of the most famous episodes of the evergreen Super Mario’s saga, our hero used to go throughout portraits to reach awesome worlds.. which is the exact name of this videogame?
SPECIAL DOUBLE 2: \n the first appearance of Donkey Kong, was as an enemy of whom became the very well-know Super Mario.. which of the following answer, describe the bad Donkey Kong?
SPECIAL DOUBLE 3: \n in the famous rainbow run, the worst fear of whom ever get in a go-kart, which was the biggest danger?
SPECIAL DOUBLE 4: \n one of many characters to unlock was Luigi.. How could you unlock him?
SPECIAL DOUBLE 5: \n main character of this saga: Douglas Jay Falcon (Captain Falcon), wasn’t only one of the most famous space racers.. which was his job?
SPECIAL DOUBLE 6: \n One of the first enemy that Samus have to tackle in this videogame, is an historic enemy.. that should dead! Ridley.. what’s the particularity of this enemy?
SPECIAL DOUBLE 7: \n what’s the name of his inseparable second?

SPECIAL DOUBLE 8: \n in this awesome videogame, our hero should face a lot of terrible enemies with extraordinary powers.. which ones of the following name are really names of Robot Masters? (select 3 on 4)

SPECIAL DOUBLE 9: \n influential characters, in this videogame, are the three goddess, that created the Hyrule world. which ones of the following, are real names of these almighty goddess? (select 3 on 4)

SPECIAL DOUBLE 10: \n one of the protagonists of the game is Crono, that during the game is tragically killed by Lavos .. the other characters will face countless adventures to master time, go back and save their comrade.. what is the peculiarity that has made famous this game?
each lap, the last ranked received a weapon
each lap, the first ranked received a weapon
weapons were contained in special box spreaded along the circuit
weapons were bought in a special shop in the pause menu
using the special move of your character
making the rival fell down from the ring
collecting the biggest amount of points before the ending of time
buying special boosts on the shops
hitting a joystick button when hurting a rival during the race
stepping over special panel spreaded along the circuit
a small gimmick able to manipulate the flow of causality
a magical amulet that brings back time
a clock came from the future which can lead back and forth in time
a legendary time machine feeded with triggon crystals
Mario never went throughout portrait.. only pipes!!
he is the king of the skull island
he captures Mario’s engaged and brings her to the top of a skyline under construction, throwing down barrels and various objects
he is a donkey that dreams to be an horse
he jumps from a skyline to the other, throwing down bananas, Mario should pick all of them!
one lap was clockwise and one anticlockwise
the circuit didn’t have guard rails and it was easly to fell down
the circuit was a huge rainbow and each pilot couldrun on one color
completing the game with Mario without using any weapon
completing the first level stopping the countdown timer in a number that ends with 2 seconds.
Beating Mario using Peach’s special move
it’s a mechanic copy of the original Ridley, created by spaces pirates
it’s only the imagination of the protagonist
at the end of the game, player discovers that Crono and Larvos are the same person!
Crono is the son of Larvos!
you can finish the game without reviving Crono during the adventure .. or even you can play the game NEVER letting him die in the course of history!
to save Crono, the Chrono Trigger should be destroyed!
